font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 v. 打孔，穿透： to make a hole through
【例】 to perforate with a pin 用针穿孔
【近】 bore, drill, hole, pierce, punch, puncture, riddle
【记】 from per- "through" + forare "to pierce刺穿"
【另】 imperforate 无孔的
